abstract: The Bay Area should be used to Jim Harbaugh working football miracles by now. He just wasn't expected to do it this quickly.
snippet: The Bay Area should be used to Jim Harbaugh working football miracles by now. He just wasn't expected to do it this quickly.
lead_paragraph: From 1983 to 1998, the San Francisco 49ers won at least 10 games each season. They made the playoffs 15 times in those 16 years, and again earned playoff berths in 2001 and 2002.

headline.main: Harbaugh and How the 49ers Were Built
